trans-unit.source: Returns a derived key suitable for use.

trans-unit.source: Returns a jar that'll automatically encrypt cookie values before sending them to the client and will decrypt them for read. If the cookie was tampered with by the user (or a 3rd party), nil will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个jar，该jar将在将cookie值发送到客户端之前自动对其进行加密，并将其解密以供读取。如果Cookie被用户（或第三者）篡改，则将返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a jar that'll automatically generate a signed representation of cookie value and verify it when reading from the cookie again. This is useful for creating cookies with values that the user is not supposed to change. If a signed cookie was tampered with by the user (or a 3rd party), nil will be returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个jar，它将自动生成一个签名的cookie值表示形式，并在再次从cookie中读取时进行验证。这对于创建具有用户不应更改的值的cookie很有用。如果用户（或第三方）篡改了已签名的cookie，则将返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a label tag tailored for labelling an input field for a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). The text of label will default to the attribute name unless a translation is found in the current I18n locale (through helpers.label.<modelname>.<attribute>) or you specify it explicitly. Additional options on the label tag can be passed as a hash with options. These options will be tagged onto the HTML as an HTML element attribute as in the example shown, except for the :value option, which is designed to target labels for #radio_button tags (where the value is used in the ID of the input tag).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标签标签，该标签标签专门用于标记分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上指定属性（由 method 标识）的输入字段。除非在当前I18n语言环境（通过helpers.label。<modelname>。<attribute>）中找到翻译，或者您明确指定了翻译，否则label的文本将默认为属性名称。 label标签上的其他选项可以作为带有 options 的哈希值传递。这些选项将按照所示示例作为HTML元素属性标记到HTML上，但 :value 选项除外，该选项设计用于定位#radio_button标签的标签（其中值用于输入标签的ID） 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a label tag tailored for labelling an input field for a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). Additional options on the label tag can be passed as a hash with options. These options will be tagged onto the HTML as an HTML element attribute as in the example shown, except for the :value option, which is designed to target labels for #radio_button tags (where the value is used in the ID of the input tag).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个标签标签，该标签标签专门用于标记分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上指定属性（由 method 标识）的输入字段。除非在当前I18n语言环境（通过helpers.label。<modelname>。<attribute>）中找到翻译，或者您明确指定了翻译，否则label的文本将默认为属性名称。 label标签上的其他选项可以作为带有 options 的哈希值传递。这些选项将按照所示示例作为HTML元素属性标记到HTML上，但 :value 选项除外，该选项设计用于定位#radio_button标签的标签（其中值用于输入标签的ID） 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a link tag that browsers and feed readers can use to auto-detect an RSS, Atom, or JSON feed.
trans-unit.target: Returns a link tag that browsers and feed readers can use to auto-detect an RSS,Atom,or JSON feed.

trans-unit.source: Returns a link tag that browsers and feed readers can use to auto-detect an RSS, Atom, or JSON feed. The type can be :rss (default), :atom, or :json. Control the link options in url_for format using the url_options. You can modify the LINK tag itself in tag_options.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个链接标记，浏览器和提要阅读器可以使用该链接标记来自动检测RSS，Atom或JSON提要。的 type 可以是 :rss （默认）， :atom ，或 :json 。使用 url_options 控制url_for格式的链接选项。您可以在 tag_options 中修改LINK标记本身。

trans-unit.source: Returns a link tag that browsers can use to preload the source. The source can be the path of a resource managed by asset pipeline, a full path, or an URI.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个链接标记，浏览器可以使用该标记来预加载 source 。该 source 可以是资产管道，一个完整路径，或URI管理的资源的路径。

trans-unit.target: Returns a list of modules,normalized from the acceptable kinds of helpers with the following behavior:

trans-unit.source: Returns a module with all the helpers defined for the engine.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Date representing the date 1 day after today (i.e. tomorrow's date).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新日期，该日期代表今天（即明天的日期）之后1天的日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Date representing the date 1 day ago (i.e. yesterday's date).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Date，它表示1天前的日期（即昨天的日期）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Date where one or more of the elements have been changed according to the options parameter. The options parameter is a hash with a combination of these keys: :year, :month, :day.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Date，其中一个或多个元素已根据 options 参数进行了更改。该 options 的参数是与这些键的组合哈希： :year ， :month ， :day 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the end of the day (23:59:59).

trans-unit.target: 返回表示小时结束时间（hh：59：59）的新DateTime。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the end of the minute (hh:mm:59).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，代表分钟的结束时间（hh：mm：59）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the middle of the day (12:00)
trans-unit.target: 返回代表日期中间（12:00）的新日期时间

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the start of the day (0:00).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，代表一天的开始时间（0:00）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the start of the hour (hh:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 返回代表小时开始时间（hh：00：00）的新DateTime。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the start of the minute (hh:mm:00).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，代表分钟的开始（hh：mm：00）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the time a number of seconds ago. Do not use this method in combination with x.months, use months_ago instead!
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，表示秒前的时间。请勿将此方法与x.months结合使用，而应使用months_ago！

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime representing the time a number of seconds since the instance time. Do not use this method in combination with x.months, use months_since instead!
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，它表示从实例时间起经过秒数的时间。请勿将此方法与x.months结合使用，而应使用months_since！

trans-unit.source: Returns a new DateTime where one or more of the elements have been changed according to the options parameter. The time options (:hour, :min, :sec) reset cascadingly, so if only the hour is passed, then minute and sec is set to 0. If the hour and minute is passed, then sec is set to 0. The options parameter takes a hash with any of these keys: :year, :month, :day, :hour, :min, :sec, :offset, :start.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的DateTime，其中一个或多个元素已根据 options 参数进行了更改。的时间选项（ :hour ， :min ， :sec ）复位cascadingly，因此，如果仅小时通过，则分和秒被设置为0。如果的小时和分钟被传递，然后秒被设置为0的 options 参数采用以下任何一个键的哈希值 :year ， :month ， :day ， :hour ， :min ， :sec ， :offset ， :start 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Http::Headers instance containing the contents of headers_or_env and the original instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Http :: Headers实例，其中包含 headers_or_env 的内容和原始实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActiveModel::Name instance. By default, the namespace and name option will take the namespace and name of the given class respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的ActiveModel :: Name实例。默认情况下， namespace 和 name 选项将分别采用给定类的名称空间和名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters object that has been instantiated with the request.parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的ActionController :: Parameters对象，该对象已使用 request.parameters 实例化。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the end of the day, 23:59:59.999999
trans-unit.target: 返回代表一天结束的新时间 23：59：59.999999

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the end of the hour, x:59:59.999999
trans-unit.target: 返回代表小时结束的新时间 x：59：59.999999

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the end of the minute, x:xx:59.999999
trans-unit.target: 返回代表分钟结束的新时间 x：xx：59.999999

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the middle of the day (12:00)
trans-unit.target: 返回代表一天中午（12:00）的新时间

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the start of the day (0:00)
trans-unit.target: 返回代表一天开始的新时间（0:00）

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the start of the hour (x:00)
trans-unit.target: 返回代表小时开始的新时间（x：00）

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the start of the minute (x:xx:00)
trans-unit.target: 返回代表分钟开始的新时间（x：xx：00）

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the time a number of seconds ago, this is basically a wrapper around the Numeric extension
trans-unit.target: 返回一个表示秒前时间的新时间，基本上是数字扩展程序的包装

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time representing the time a number of seconds since the instance time
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的Time，表示从实例时间起经过秒数的时间

trans-unit.source: Returns a new Time where one or more of the elements have been changed according to the options parameter. The time options (:hour, :min, :sec, :usec, :nsec) reset cascadingly, so if only the hour is passed, then minute, sec, usec and nsec is set to 0. If the hour and minute is passed, then sec, usec and nsec is set to 0. The options parameter takes a hash with any of these keys: :year, :month, :day, :hour, :min, :sec, :usec, :nsec, :offset. Pass either :usec or :nsec, not both.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的时间，其中一个或多个元素已根据 options 参数进行了更改。时间选项（ :hour ， :min ， :sec ， :usec ， :nsec ）是级联重置的，因此，如果仅经过小时，则将min，sec，usec和nsec设置为0。如果经过了小时和分钟，然后秒，微秒和纳秒被设置为0的 options 参数接受散列与任何这些键： :year ， :month ， :day ， :hour ， :min ， :sec ， :usec ， :nsec ， :offset 。传递 :usec 或 :nsec ，不能两者都传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters instance that filters out the given keys.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，该实例过滤出给定的 keys 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters instance that includes only the given filters and sets the permitted attribute for the object to true. This is useful for limiting which attributes should be allowed for mass updating.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，该实例仅包含给定的 filters ，并将对象的 permitted 属性设置为 true 。这对于限制应允许进行批量更新的属性很有用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters instance that includes only the given keys. If the given keys don't exist, returns an empty hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，该实例仅包含给定的 keys 。如果给定的 keys 不存在，则返回一个空哈希。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters instance with the results of running block once for every key. The values are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，其中每个键一次运行 block 的结果。值保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters with all keys from other_hash merged into current hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 并将 other_hash 中的所有键合并到当前哈希中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters with all keys from current hash merged into other_hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters 并将当前哈希中的所有键合并到 other_hash 中。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActionController::Parameters with the results of running block once for every value. The keys are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActionController::Parameters ，其中每个值一次运行 block 的结果。按键不变。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new ActiveSupport::TimeWithZone where one or more of the elements have been changed according to the options parameter. The time options (:hour, :min, :sec, :usec, :nsec) reset cascadingly, so if only the hour is passed, then minute, sec, usec and nsec is set to 0. If the hour and minute is passed, then sec, usec and nsec is set to 0. The options parameter takes a hash with any of these keys: :year, :month, :day, :hour, :min, :sec, :usec, :nsec, :offset, :zone. Pass either :usec or :nsec, not both. Similarly, pass either :zone or :offset, not both.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的 ActiveSupport::TimeWithZone ，其中一个或多个元素已根据 options 参数进行了更改。时间选项（ :hour ， :min ， :sec ， :usec ， :nsec ）级联重置，因此，如果仅经过小时，则将min，sec，usec和nsec设置为0。如果经过小时和分钟，然后秒，微秒和纳秒被设置为0的 options 参数接受散列与任何这些键： :year ， :month ， :day ， :hour ， :min ， :sec ， :usec ， :nsec ， :offset ， :zone 。传递 :usec 或 :nsec ，不能两者都传递。同样，传递 :zone 或 :offset ，而不是两者都传递。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new array of the keys of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的参数数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new array of the values of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的参数值数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new array that includes the passed elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含传入元素的新数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time at the beginning of the year.
trans-unit.target: 返回年初的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time at the end of the quarter.
trans-unit.target: 在季度末返回一个新的日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time at the start of the month.
trans-unit.target: 返回月初的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time at the start of the quarter.
trans-unit.target: 在季度开始时返回一个新的日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the end of the month. DateTime objects will have a time set to 23:59:59.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表月末的新日期/时间。DateTime对象的时间将设置为23:59:59。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the end of the year. DateTime objects will have a time set to 23:59:59.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示年末的新日期/时间。DateTime对象的时间将设置为23:59:59。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the end of this week on the given day. Week is assumed to start on start_day, default is Date.beginning_of_week or config.beginning_of_week when set. DateTime objects have their time set to 23:59:59.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示给定日期本周结束的新日期/时间。假设周从 start_day 开始，设置时默认为 Date.beginning_of_week 或 config.beginning_of_week 。DateTime对象的时间设置为23:59:59。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the given day in the next week.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的日期/时间,代表下一周给定的一天。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the given day in the previous week. Week is assumed to start on start_day, default is Date.beginning_of_week or config.beginning_of_week when set. DateTime objects have their time set to 0:00 unless same_time is true.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表上一周给定日期的新日期/时间。假设周从 start_day 开始，设置时默认为 Date.beginning_of_week 或 config.beginning_of_week 。除非 same_time 为true，否则DateTime对象的时间设置为0:00 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the next occurrence of the specified day of week.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的日期/时间,代表下一次出现的指定星期的日期。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the next weekday.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的日期/时间,代表下一个工作日。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the previous occurrence of the specified day of week.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的日期/时间,代表指定星期的前一天。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the previous weekday.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表前一个工作日的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing the start of this week on the given day. Week is assumed to start on start_day, default is Date.beginning_of_week or config.beginning_of_week when set. DateTime objects have their time set to 0:00.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示给定日期本周开始的新日期/时间。假设周从 start_day 开始，设置时默认为 Date.beginning_of_week 或 config.beginning_of_week 。 DateTime 对象的时间设置为0:00。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing tomorrow.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表明天的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time representing yesterday.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个代表昨天的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of days ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定天数前的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of days in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定天数的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of months ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定月数前的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of months in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定月数的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of weeks ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定周数前的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of weeks in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定周数的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of years ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定年数的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new date/time the specified number of years in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定年数的新日期/时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with self and other_hash merged recursively.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有 self 和 other_hash 递归合并的新哈希。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all keys converted by the block operation. This includes the keys from the root hash and from all nested hashes and arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希值,其中包含所有通过块操作转换的键。这包括根哈希和所有嵌套哈希和数组中的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all keys converted to strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希,其中所有键都转换为字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all keys converted to strings. This includes the keys from the root hash and from all nested hashes and arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希,其中所有键都转换为字符串。这包括根哈希和所有嵌套哈希和数组中的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all keys converted to symbols, as long as they respond to to_sym.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希值，其中所有键都转换为符号，只要它们响应 to_sym 即可。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all keys converted to symbols, as long as they respond to to_sym. This includes the keys from the root hash and from all nested hashes and arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希值，其中所有键都转换为符号，只要它们响应 to_sym 即可。这包括来自根哈希以及所有嵌套哈希和数组的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new hash with all values converted by the block operation. This includes the values from the root hash and from all nested hashes and arrays.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的哈希值,其中包含所有通过块操作转换的值。这包括来自根哈希和所有嵌套哈希和数组的值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of ActionController::Parameters with items that the block evaluates to true removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ActionController::Parameters 的新实例，其中包含该块评估为true的项目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of ActionController::Parameters with only items that the block evaluates to true.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ActionController::Parameters 的新实例，其中仅包含该块评估为true的项目。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of ActionController::Parameters. Also, sets the permitted attribute to the default value of ActionController::Parameters.permit_all_parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回 ActionController::Parameters 的新实例。另外，将 permitted 属性设置为 ActionController::Parameters.permit_all_parameters 的默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the associated type that has been instantiated with attributes and linked to this object through a foreign key, but has not yet been saved.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个关联类型的新对象，该对象已使用 attributes 实例化并通过外键链接到该对象，但尚未保存。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the associated type that has been instantiated with attributes, linked to this object through a foreign key, and that has already been saved (if it passed the validation).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个关联类型的新对象，该对象已用 attributes 实例化，并通过外键链接到该对象，并且已经保存（如果它通过了验证）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the collection type that has been instantiated with attributes and linked to this object through the join table, but has not yet been saved.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个集合类型的新对象，该对象已使用 attributes 实例化并通过连接表链接到该对象，但尚未保存。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the collection type that has been instantiated with attributes and linked to this object, but have not yet been saved. You can pass an array of attributes hashes, this will return an array with the new objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个集合类型的新对象，该对象已使用 attributes 实例化并链接到该对象，但尚未保存。您可以传递一个属性哈希数组，这将返回一个包含新对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the collection type that has been instantiated with attributes, linked to this object through a foreign key, and that has already been saved (if it passed the validation). Note: This only works if the base model already exists in the DB, not if it is a new (unsaved) record!
trans-unit.target: 返回一个集合类型的新对象，该对象已使用 attributes 实例化，并通过外键链接到该对象，并且已经保存（如果它通过了验证）。注意：仅当数据库中已经存在基本模型时，这才有效，如果它是新的（未保存）记录，则无效！

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the collection type that has been instantiated with attributes, linked to this object through the join table, and that has already been saved (if it passed the validation).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个集合类型的新对象，该对象已用 attributes 实例化，并通过连接表链接到该对象，并且已经保存（如果它通过了验证）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new object of the collection type that has been instantiated with attributes, linked to this object and that has already been saved (if it passes the validations).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的集合类型的对象,该对象已经被实例化,带有属性,链接到这个对象,并且已经被保存(如果它通过了验证)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new relation expressing WHERE + NOT condition according to the conditions in the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 根据参数中的条件返回一个新的关系,表达WHERE+NOT条件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new relation, which is the logical union of this relation and the one passed as an argument.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的关系,它是这个关系和作为参数传递的关系的逻辑结合。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new relation, which is the result of filtering the current relation according to the conditions in the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的关系,它是根据参数中的条件过滤当前关系的结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new string with all occurrences of the patterns removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个新的字符串,其中包含所有模式的出现。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of days ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定天数前的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of days in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定天数的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of months ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定月数前的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of months in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回未来指定月数的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of years ago.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定年数前的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new time the specified number of years in the future.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定年数的新时间。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new, unsaved blob instance after the io has been uploaded to the service. When providing a content type, pass identify: false to bypass automatic content type inference.
trans-unit.target: 将 io 上传到服务后，返回一个新的未保存的Blob实例。提供内容类型时，传递 identify: false 以绕过自动内容类型推断。

trans-unit.source: Returns a number port suffix like 8080 if the port number of this request is not the default HTTP port 80 or HTTPS port 443.
trans-unit.target: 如果这个请求的端口号不是默认的HTTP端口80或HTTPS端口443,则返回一个数字端口后缀,如8080。

trans-unit.source: Returns a parameter for the given key. If not found, returns nil.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 key 的参数。如果未找到，则返回 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a parameter for the given key. If the key can't be found, there are several options: With no other arguments, it will raise an ActionController::ParameterMissing error; if a second argument is given, then that is returned (converted to an instance of ActionController::Parameters if possible); if a block is given, then that will be run and its result returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定 key 的参数。如果找不到该 key ，则有几种选择：没有其他参数，它将引发 ActionController::ParameterMissing 错误；如果给定第二个参数，则返回该参数（如果可能，转换为ActionController :: Parameters的实例）；如果给出了一个块，则将运行该块并返回其结果。

trans-unit.source: Returns a quoted version of the primary key name, used to construct SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: 返回主键名的引用版本,用于构造SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Returns a quoted version of the table name, used to construct SQL statements.
trans-unit.target: 返回表名的引号版本,用于构造SQL语句。

trans-unit.source: Returns a radio button tag for accessing a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). If the current value of method is tag_value the radio button will be checked.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个单选按钮标记，用于访问分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上的指定属性（由 method 标识）。如果当前值 method 是 tag_value 单选按钮将被检查。

trans-unit.source: Returns a radio button tag for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于访问指定属性的单选按钮标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns a record hash with the column names as keys and column values as values.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个以列名为键和列值为值的记录哈希。

trans-unit.source: Returns a renderer instance (inherited from ActionController::Renderer) for the controller.
trans-unit.target: 返回控制器的渲染器实例（从ActionController :: Renderer继承）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a representation of the annotation that looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个类似于这样的注解的表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a response that has no content (merely headers). The options argument is interpreted to be a hash of header names and values. This allows you to easily return a response that consists only of significant headers:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个没有内容(只有头)的响应。options参数被解释为头名和值的哈希。这允许你轻松地返回一个只由重要的头文件组成的响应。

trans-unit.source: Returns a safe ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess representation of the parameters with all unpermitted keys removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数的安全 ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess 表示形式，并删除所有不允许的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a safe Hash representation of the parameters with all unpermitted keys removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数的安全 Hash 表示形式，其中删除了所有不允许的键。

trans-unit.source: Returns a saved blob without uploading a file to the service. This blob will point to a key where there is no file yet. It's intended to be used together with a client-side upload, which will first create the blob in order to produce the signed URL for uploading. This signed URL points to the key generated by the blob. Once the form using the direct upload is submitted, the blob can be associated with the right record using the signed ID.
trans-unit.target: 返回保存的Blob，而不将文件上传到服务。此Blob将指向尚无文件的键。它打算与客户端上传一起使用，客户端上传将首先创建Blob，以生成用于上传的签名URL。该签名的URL指向Blob生成的密钥。提交使用直接上传的表格后，便可以使用签名的ID将Blob与正确的记录相关联。

trans-unit.source: Returns a saved blob instance after the io has been uploaded to the service. Note, the blob is first built, then the io is uploaded, then the blob is saved. This is done this way to avoid uploading (which may take time), while having an open database transaction. When providing a content type, pass identify: false to bypass automatic content type inference.
trans-unit.target: 将 io 上传到服务后，返回保存的blob实例。请注意，首先构建Blob，然后上传 io ，然后保存Blob。这样做是为了避免在进行开放式数据库事务时上载（可能要花一些时间）。提供内容类型时，传递 identify: false 以绕过自动内容类型推断。

trans-unit.source: Returns a scope for the model without the previously set scopes.
trans-unit.target: 返回模型的作用域,不含之前设置的作用域。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the days 1 through 31 with the current day selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个选择标签,其中包含当前选择的第1至31天的选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the days 1 through 31 with the current day selected. The date can also be substituted for a day number. If you want to display days with a leading zero set the :use_two_digit_numbers key in options to true. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'day' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含选择当前日期的第1天到第31天的每一天的选项。的 date 也可取代的天数时。如果要显示前导零的 :use_two_digit_numbers 在 options 中将：use_two_digit_numbers键设置为true。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'day'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the five years on each side of the current, which is selected. The five year radius can be changed using the :start_year and :end_year keys in the options.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含当前选定状态的每五年中的每一年的选项。可以使用 options 中的 :start_year 和 :end_year 键更改五年半径。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the five years on each side of the current, which is selected. The five year radius can be changed using the :start_year and :end_year keys in the options. Both ascending and descending year lists are supported by making :start_year less than or greater than :end_year. The date can also be substituted for a year given as a number. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'year' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含当前选定状态的每五年中的每一年的选项。可以使用 options 中的 :start_year 和 :end_year 键更改五年半径。使 :start_year 小于或大于 :end_year 都支持升序和降序列表。该 date 也可代替给出数字的一年。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'year'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the hours 0 through 23 with the current hour selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个选择标签,其中包含当前小时数0到23的每个小时的选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the hours 0 through 23 with the current hour selected. The datetime can be either a Time or DateTime object or an integer. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'hour' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含从0到23的每个小时的选项，并选择了当前小时。的 datetime 可以是 Time 或 DateTime 对象或一个整数。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'hour'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the minutes 0 through 59 with the current minute selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个选择标签,其中包含当前选择的0到59分钟的每个分钟的选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the minutes 0 through 59 with the current minute selected. Also can return a select tag with options by minute_step from 0 through 59 with the 00 minute selected. The datetime can be either a Time or DateTime object or an integer. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'minute' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含选择了当前分钟的0至59分钟中的每个分钟的选项。还可以通过返回与选项的选择标签 minute_step 从0到59中选择00分。的 datetime 可以是 Time 或 DateTime 对象或一个整数。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'minute'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the months January through December with the current month selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有1月至12月各月选项的选择标签,并选择当前月份。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the months January through December with the current month selected. The month names are presented as keys (what's shown to the user) and the month numbers (1-12) are used as values (what's submitted to the server). It's also possible to use month numbers for the presentation instead of names – set the :use_month_numbers key in options to true for this to happen. If you want both numbers and names, set the :add_month_numbers key in options to true. If you would prefer to show month names as abbreviations, set the :use_short_month key in options to true. If you want to use your own month names, set the :use_month_names key in options to an array of 12 month names. If you want to display months with a leading zero set the :use_two_digit_numbers key in options to true. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'month' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含从1月到12月的每个月的选项，并选择了当前月份。月份名称显示为键（显示给用户的内容），月份编号（1-12）用作值（提交给服务器的内容）。也可以使用月份号代替名称，将 options 的 :use_month_numbers 键设置为true即可。如果需要数字和名称，请将 options 的 :add_month_numbers 键设置为true。如果您希望将月份名称显示为缩写，请将 options 的 :use_short_month 键设置为true。如果要使用自己的月份名称，请设置 :use_month_names 在 options 键入12个月名称的数组。如果要显示前导零的月份，请在 options 中将 :use_two_digit_numbers 键设置为true。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'month'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the seconds 0 through 59 with the current second selected.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个选择标签,其中包含当前秒数为0到59的每个秒数的选项。

trans-unit.source: Returns a select tag with options for each of the seconds 0 through 59 with the current second selected. The datetime can be either a Time or DateTime object or an integer. Override the field name using the :field_name option, 'second' by default.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个select标记，其中包含从0到59的每个秒的选项，并选择了当前秒。的 datetime 可以是 Time 或 DateTime 对象或一个整数。使用 :field_name 选项覆盖字段名称，默认为'second'。

trans-unit.source: Returns a serialized hash of your object.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的序列化哈希值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for hour and minute).
trans-unit.target: 返回一组HTML选择标签(小时和分钟各一个)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for hour and minute). You can set :time_separator key to format the output, and the :include_seconds option to include an input for seconds.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组HTML选择标签（一个小时和一分钟）。您可以设置 :time_separator 键来格式化输出，并设置 :include_seconds 选项以包括几秒钟的输入。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for year, month, and day) pre-selected with the date provided.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用提供的 date 预先选择的一组HTML选择标签（分别用于年，月和日）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for year, month, and day) pre-selected with the date. It's possible to explicitly set the order of the tags using the :order option with an array of symbols :year, :month and :day in the desired order. If the array passed to the :order option does not contain all the three symbols, all tags will be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组使用 date 预先选择的HTML选择标记（一个用于年，月和日）。可以使用 :order 选项，以所需的顺序使用符号 :year ， :month 和 :day 的数组显式设置标签的顺序。如果传递给 :order 选项的数组不包含所有三个符号，则所有标签都将被隐藏。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for year, month, day, hour, and minute) pre-selected with the datetime provided.
trans-unit.target: 返回使用提供的 datetime 时间预先选择的一组HTML选择标签（一个用于年，月，日，小时和分钟的选择标签）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of HTML select-tags (one for year, month, day, hour, minute, and second) pre-selected with the datetime. It's also possible to explicitly set the order of the tags using the :order option with an array of symbols :year, :month and :day in the desired order. If you do not supply a Symbol, it will be appended onto the :order passed in. You can also add :date_separator, :datetime_separator and :time_separator keys to the options to control visual display of the elements.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组用 datetime 预选的HTML选择标记（一个用于年，月，日，时，分和秒的HTML选择标记）。也可以使用 :order 选项，以所需的顺序用符号数组 :year ， :month 和 :day 来显式设置标签的顺序。如果不提供符号，它将被附加到传入的 :order 中。您还可以在 options 添加 :date_separator ， :datetime_separator 和 :time_separator 键，以控制元素的可视显示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of select tags (one for hour, minute and optionally second) pre-selected for accessing a specified time-based attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). You can include the seconds with :include_seconds. You can get hours in the AM/PM format with :ampm option.
trans-unit.target: 返回一组预选择的选择标签（一个小时，一分钟和可选的第二个），这些选择标签用于访问分配给模板的对象上的指定基于时间的属性（由 method 标识）（由 object 标识）。您可以使用 :include_seconds 包含秒。您可以使用 :ampm 选项以AM / PM格式获取小时数。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of select tags (one for hour, minute, and optionally second) pre-selected for accessing a specified time-based attribute. The selects are prepared for multi-parameter assignment to an Active Record object.
trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定的基于时间的属性而预先选择的一组选择标签(一个用于小时、分钟和可选的秒)。选择的标签是为多参数分配到活动记录对象而准备的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of select tags (one for year, month, and day) pre-selected for accessing a specified date-based attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object).
trans-unit.target: 返回一组预选择的选择标签（一个年，月，日），这些标签用于访问分配给模板的对象上的指定基于日期的属性（由 method 标识）（由 object 标识）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of select tags (one for year, month, and day) pre-selected for accessing a specified date-based attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定的基于日期的属性而预先选择的一组选择标签(年、月、日各一个)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a set of select tags (one for year, month, day, hour, and minute) pre-selected for accessing a specified datetime-based attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object).
trans-unit.target: 返回一组选择标签（一个年，月，日，小时和分钟的选择标签），这些选择标签是预先选择的，用于访问分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上的指定的基于datetime的属性（ method 标识）。

trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定的基于日期的属性而预先选择的一组选择标签(年、月、日、时、分各一个)。

trans-unit.source: Returns a shallow copy of the hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回哈希的浅层副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns a signed ID for this blob that's suitable for reference on the client-side without fear of tampering. It uses the framework-wide verifier on ActiveStorage.verifier, but with a dedicated purpose.
trans-unit.target: 返回此Blob的签名ID，适合在客户端参考，而不必担心被篡改。它使用 ActiveStorage.verifier 上的整个框架范围的验证程序，但具有专用目的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a signed key for all the transformations that this variation was instantiated with.
trans-unit.target: 为实例化此变体的所有 transformations 返回一个带符号的密钥。

trans-unit.source: Returns a signed key for the transformations, which can be used to refer to a specific variation in a URL or combined key (like ActiveStorage::Variant#key).
trans-unit.target: 返回一个签名的密钥 transformations ，它可以用来指在一个URL或组合键（如特定变化 ActiveStorage::Variant#key ）。

trans-unit.source: Returns a signed, temporary URL for the file at the key. The URL will be valid for the amount of seconds specified in expires_in. You must also provide the disposition (:inline or :attachment), filename, and content_type that you wish the file to be served with on request.
trans-unit.target: 返回位于 key 的文件的签名的临时URL 。该URL将在 expires_in 中指定的秒数内有效。您还必须提供希望随请求一起提供文件的 disposition （ :inline 或 :attachment ）， filename 和 content_type 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a signed, temporary URL that a direct upload file can be PUT to on the key. The URL will be valid for the amount of seconds specified in expires_in. You must also provide the content_type, content_length, and checksum of the file that will be uploaded. All these attributes will be validated by the service upon upload.
trans-unit.target: 返回签名的临时URL，可以将直接上传文件放置在 key 上。该URL将在 expires_in 中指定的秒数内有效。您还必须提供将要上传的文件的 content_type ， content_length 和 checksum 。上传后，服务将验证所有这些属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single DatabaseConfig object based on the requested environment.
trans-unit.target: 根据所请求的环境返回一个单一的DatabaseConfig对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns a single value from a record
trans-unit.target: 返回一个记录中的单个值

trans-unit.source: Returns a stable cache key that can be used to identify this query. The cache key is built with a fingerprint of the SQL query.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个稳定的缓存密钥,可以用来识别这个查询。缓存密钥是根据SQL查询的指纹建立的。

trans-unit.source: Returns a stable cache key that can be used to identify this record.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个稳定的缓存密钥,可以用来识别这个记录。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing an XML representation of its receiver:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含接收器的XML表示的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string containing the protocol used plus "://", for example "http://".
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含所使用的协议加"://"的字符串,例如 "http://"。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of <option> tags, like options_for_select, but wraps them with <optgroup> tags:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <option> 标签的字符串，例如 options_for_select ，但是用 <optgroup> 标签包装它们：

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of <option> tags, like options_from_collection_for_select, but groups them by <optgroup> tags based on the object relationships of the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回一串 <option> 标记，例如 options_from_collection_for_select ，但是根据参数的对象关系将它们按 <optgroup> 标记分组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of option tags, like options_from_collection_for_select, but groups them by optgroup tags based on the object relationships of the arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回一串 option 标签，例如 options_from_collection_for_select ，但是根据参数的对象关系按 optgroup 标签对它们进行分组。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of option tags for pretty much any time zone in the world.
trans-unit.target: 返回世界上几乎所有时区的选项标签的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of option tags for pretty much any time zone in the world. Supply an ActiveSupport::TimeZone name as selected to have it marked as the selected option tag. You can also supply an array of ActiveSupport::TimeZone objects as priority_zones, so that they will be listed above the rest of the (long) list. (You can use ActiveSupport::TimeZone.us_zones as a convenience for obtaining a list of the US time zones, or a Regexp to select the zones of your choice)
trans-unit.target: 返回世界上几乎所有时区的选项标签字符串。提供一个ActiveSupport :: TimeZone名称作为 selected 名称，以将其标记为所选选项标签。您还可以提供一个ActiveSupport :: TimeZone对象数组作为 priority_zones ，以便将它们列在其余（长）列表的上方。 （您可以使用ActiveSupport :: TimeZone.us_zones方便地获取美国时区列表，或者使用Regexp来选择所需的时区）

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of option tags that have been compiled by iterating over the collection and assigning the result of a call to the value_method as the option value and the text_method as the option text.
trans-unit.target: 返回一串选项标签，这些选项标签通过遍历 collection 并将调用结果分配给 value_method 作为选项值和 text_method 作为选项文本来进行编译。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of the object's date and time in the ISO 8601 standard format.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个ISO 8601标准格式的对象日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of the object's date and time in the RFC 2822 standard format.
trans-unit.target: 以RFC 2822标准格式返回对象的日期和时间字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of the object's date and time in the format used by HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的日期和时间的字符串,格式为HTTP请求使用。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of the object's date and time. Accepts an optional format:
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的日期和时间的字符串。接受可选 format ：

trans-unit.source: Returns a string of the object's date, time, zone, and offset from UTC.
trans-unit.target: 返回对象的日期、时间、区域以及与UTC的偏移量的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string port suffix, including colon, like “:8080” if the port number of this request is not the default HTTP port 80 or HTTPS port 443.
trans-unit.target: 如果此请求的端口号不是默认的HTTP端口80或HTTPS端口443，则返回字符串端口后缀，包括冒号，例如“：8080”。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the key attribute(s) that is suitable for use in an HTML DOM id. This can be overwritten to customize the default generated string representation if desired. If you need to read back a key from a #dom_id in order to query for the underlying database record, you should write a helper like 'person_record_from_dom_id' that will extract the key either based on the default implementation (which just joins all key attributes with '_') or on your own overwritten version of the method. By default, this implementation passes the key string through a method that replaces all characters that are invalid inside DOM ids, with valid ones. You need to make sure yourself that your dom ids are valid, in case you overwrite this method.
trans-unit.target: 返回适合在HTML DOM id中使用的键属性的字符串表示形式。如果需要，可以将其覆盖以自定义默认生成的字符串表示形式。如果您需要从#dom_id中读取密钥以查询基础数据库记录，则应编写一个类似于'person_record_from_dom_id'的助手，该助手将根据默认实现提取密钥（它将所有密钥属性与'_'）或您自己的方法的覆盖版本。默认情况下，此实现将密钥字符串通过一种方法传递，该方法将DOM ID内部无效的所有字符替换为有效的字符。您需要确保自己的dom ID有效，以防您覆盖此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string representation of the receiver suitable for use as a URL query string:
trans-unit.target: 返回适合作为URL查询字符串使用的接收器的字符串表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the array in XML by invoking to_xml on each element. Active Record collections delegate their representation in XML to this method.
trans-unit.target: 通过在每个元素上调用 to_xml 来返回表示XML数组的字符串。Active Record集合将其XML表示形式委派给此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string to ensure compatibility with Net::HTTPResponse.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串以确保与 Net::HTTPResponse 兼容。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string which represents the time in used time zone as DateTime defined by XML Schema:
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，该字符串表示XML Schema定义的DateTime中使用的时区中的时间：

trans-unit.source: Returns a stylesheet link tag for the sources specified as arguments. If you don't specify an extension, .css will be appended automatically.
trans-unit.target: 为指定为参数的源返回样式表链接标记。如果不指定扩展名，将自动添加 .css 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a stylesheet link tag for the sources specified as arguments. If you don't specify an extension, .css will be appended automatically. You can modify the link attributes by passing a hash as the last argument. For historical reasons, the 'media' attribute will always be present and defaults to “screen”, so you must explicitly set it to “all” for the stylesheet(s) to apply to all media types.
trans-unit.target: 为指定为参数的源返回样式表链接标记。如果不指定扩展名，将自动添加 .css 。您可以通过传递哈希作为最后一个参数来修改链接属性。由于历史原因，“媒体”属性将始终存在且默认为“屏幕”，因此您必须将其显式设置为“全部”，样式表才能应用于所有媒体类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring from the beginning of the string to the given position. If the position is negative, it is counted from the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从字符串开始到给定位置的子串。如果位置为负数,则从字符串的末端开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns a substring from the given position to the end of the string. If the position is negative, it is counted from the end of the string.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个从给定位置到字符串末尾的子串。如果位置是负数,则从字符串的末尾开始计算。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the full error messages in an array.
trans-unit.target: 在一个数组中返回所有完整的错误信息。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the parents of this module according to its name, ordered from nested outwards. The receiver is not contained within the result.
trans-unit.target: 根据该模块的名称,从嵌套向外排序,返回该模块的所有父节点。结果中不包含接收方。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the subdomains as a string, so "dev.www" would be returned for “dev.www.rubyonrails.org”. You can specify a different tld_length, such as 2 to catch "www" instead of "www.rubyonrails" in “www.rubyonrails.co.uk”.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回所有子域，因此将为 "dev.www" 返回“ dev.www”。您可以指定一个不同的 tld_length ，例如2来捕获 "www.rubyonrails" 中的“ "www" 而不是“ www.rubyonrails”。

trans-unit.source: Returns all the subdomains as an array, so ["dev", "www"] would be returned for “dev.www.rubyonrails.org”. You can specify a different tld_length, such as 2 to catch ["www"] instead of ["www", "rubyonrails"] in “www.rubyonrails.co.uk”.
trans-unit.target: 以数组形式返回所有子域，因此将为“ dev.www.rubyonrails.org”返回 ["dev", "www"] 。您可以指定一个不同的 tld_length ，例如2来捕获 ["www"] 而不是“ www.rubyonrails.co.uk”中的 ["www", "rubyonrails"] 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an Array of all key attributes if any of the attributes is set, whether or not the object is persisted. Returns nil if there are no key attributes.

trans-unit.source: Returns an ActiveStorage::Preview for a previewable blob or an ActiveStorage::Variant for a variable image blob.
trans-unit.target: 对于可预览的Blob 返回ActiveStorage :: Preview，对于可变的图像Blob 返回ActiveStorage :: Variant。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ActiveStorage::Preview instance with the set of transformations provided. A preview is an image generated from a non-image blob. Active Storage comes with built-in previewers for videos and PDF documents. The video previewer extracts the first frame from a video and the PDF previewer extracts the first page from a PDF document.
trans-unit.target: 返回提供了一组 transformations 的ActiveStorage :: Preview实例。预览是从非图像斑点生成的图像。Active Storage带有用于视频和PDF文档的内置预览器。视频预览器从视频中提取第一帧，而PDF预览器从PDF文档中提取第一页。

trans-unit.source: Returns an ActiveRecord::Result instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个ActiveRecord :: Result实例。

trans-unit.target: 返回提供了一组 transformations 的ActiveStorage :: Variant实例。这仅与图像文件有关，并且允许对任何图像进行大小，颜色等转换。例：

trans-unit.source: Returns an ActiveStorage::Filename instance of the filename that can be queried for basename, extension, and a sanitized version of the filename that's safe to use in URLs.
trans-unit.target: 返回文件名的ActiveStorage :: Filename实例，可以查询该文件名的基本名，扩展名和可在URL中安全使用的文件名的净化版本。

trans-unit.target: 返回模块的ActiveModel :: Name对象。它可用于检索各种与命名相关的信息（有关更多信息，请参见ActiveModel :: Name）。

trans-unit.target: 返回的ActiveSupport :: TimeWithZone代表时区的当前时间实例表示通过 self 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an #inspect-like string for the value of the attribute attr_name. String attributes are truncated up to 50 characters, Date and Time attributes are returned in the :db format. Other attributes return the value of #inspect without modification.
trans-unit.target: 返回 #inspect 的属性值般串 attr_name 。字符串属性最多可截断50个字符，日期和时间属性以 :db 格式返回。其他属性返回的值 #inspect 未经修改。

trans-unit.target: 如果没有给出块，则返回一个 Enumerator 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML audio tag for the sources. If sources is a string, a single audio tag will be returned. If sources is an array, an audio tag with nested source tags for each source will be returned. The sources can be full paths or files that exist in your public audios directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回的HTML音频标签 sources 。如果 sources 是字符串，则将返回单个音频标签。如果 sources 是一个数组，则将返回带有每个源嵌套的源标签的音频标签。该 sources 可以是完整路径，或存在于你的公共音频目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML block tag of type name surrounding the content. Add HTML attributes by passing an attributes hash to options. Instead of passing the content as an argument, you can also use a block in which case, you pass your options as the second parameter. Set escape to false to disable attribute value escaping. Note: this is legacy syntax, see tag method description for details.
trans-unit.target: 返回围绕 content name 类型的HTML块标记。通过将属性哈希传递给 options 来添加HTML属性。除了将内容作为参数传递外，还可以使用一个块，在这种情况下，您可以将 options 作为第二个参数传递。将转义设置为false可禁用属性值转义。注意：这是旧式语法，有关详细信息，请参见 tag 方法描述。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML image tag for the source. The source can be a full path, a file, or an Active Storage attachment.
trans-unit.target: 返回 source 的HTML图像标签。该 source 可以是一个完整的路径，文件，或一主动式存储附件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML script tag for each of the sources provided.

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML script tag for each of the sources provided. You can pass in the filename (.js extension is optional) of JavaScript files that exist in your app/assets/javascripts directory for inclusion into the current page or you can pass the full path relative to your document root.
trans-unit.target: 为提供的每个源返回一个HTML脚本标记。您可以传入 app/assets/javascripts 目录中存在的JavaScript文件的文件名（扩展名为 .js ），以将其包含在当前页面中，也可以传递相对于文档根目录的完整路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML tag.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个HTML标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML time tag for the given date or time.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定日期或时间的HTML时间标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an HTML video tag for the sources. If sources is a string, a single video tag will be returned. If sources is an array, a video tag with nested source tags for each source will be returned. The sources can be full paths or files that exist in your public videos directory.
trans-unit.target: 返回的HTML视频标签 sources 。如果 sources 是字符串，则将返回单个视频标签。如果 sources 是一个数组，则将返回带有每个源嵌套的源标签的视频标签。该 sources 可以是完整路径，或存在于您的公开影片目录中的文件。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array containing the connections currently in the pool. Access to the array does not require synchronization on the pool because the array is newly created and not retained by the pool.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含池中当前连接的数组。访问该数组不需要在池上进行同步,因为该数组是新创建的,不由池保留。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of Column objects for the table specified by table_name.
trans-unit.target: 返回由 table_name 指定的表的 Column 对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of AggregateReflection objects for all the aggregations in the class.
trans-unit.target: Returns an array of AggregateReflection objects for all the aggregations in the class.

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of AssociationReflection objects for all associations which have :autosave enabled.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有启用了 :autosave 的关联的AssociationReflection对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of AssociationReflection objects for all the associations in the class. If you only want to reflect on a certain association type, pass in the symbol (:has_many, :has_one, :belongs_to) as the first parameter.
trans-unit.target: 返回该类中所有关联的AssociationReflection对象数组。如果只想反映某种关联类型，请传入符号（ :has_many ， :has_one ， :belongs_to ）作为第一个参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of ColumnDefinition objects for the columns of the table.
trans-unit.target: 返回表的列的ColumnDefinition对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all TimeZone objects. There are multiple TimeZone objects per time zone, in many cases, to make it easier for users to find their own time zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有TimeZone对象的数组。在许多情况下，每个时区都有多个TimeZone对象，以使用户更容易找到自己的时区。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the attributes that have been specified as readonly.
trans-unit.target: 返回所有被指定为只读的属性的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of all the elements selected by the selector. In the second variant it first matches the base element and tries to match the selector expression on any of its children. If there are no matches both variants return an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 返回选择器选择的所有元素的数组。在第二个变体中，它首先匹配基础元素，然后尝试匹配其任何子元素上的选择器表达式。如果没有匹配项，则两个变体都返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of arrays containing the field values. Order is the same as that returned by columns.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含字段值的数组的数组。顺序与 columns 返回的顺序相同。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of attribute names as strings
trans-unit.target: 返回一个以字符串形式存在的属性名数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of callback objects that form the before_save chain.
trans-unit.target: 返回构成before_save链的回调对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of column names as strings if it's not an abstract class and table exists. Otherwise it returns an empty array.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是抽象类且表存在,则返回一个列名为字符串的数组。否则返回一个空数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of column names as strings.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列名的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of column objects where the primary id, all columns ending in “_id” or “_count”, and columns used for single table inheritance have been removed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个列对象数组，其中主ID，所有以“ _id”或“ _count”结尾的列以及用于单个表继承的列均已删除。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of established connections.
trans-unit.target: 返回已建立的连接数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of foreign keys for the given table. The foreign keys are represented as ForeignKeyDefinition objects.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定表的外键数组。外键用ForeignKeyDefinition对象表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of generator namespaces that are hidden. Generator namespaces may be hidden for a variety of reasons. Some are aliased such as “rails:migration” and can be invoked with the shorter “migration”, others are private to other generators such as “css:scaffold”.
trans-unit.target: 返回隐藏的生成器名称空间的数组。生成器名称空间可能由于多种原因而被隐藏。有些是别名，例如“ rails：migration”，可以用较短的“ migration”来调用，另一些则是其他生成器专用的，例如“ css：scaffold”。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of hashes representing each row record.
trans-unit.target: 返回代表每个行记录的哈希数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of indexes for the given table.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定表格的索引数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of instance variable names as strings including “@”.
trans-unit.target: 以字符串形式返回实例变量名称的数组，包括“ @”。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of names for the attributes available on this object.
trans-unit.target: 返回此对象上可用属性的名称数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of reflection objects for all the attachments in the class.
trans-unit.target: 返回该类中所有附件的反射对象数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of schema names.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个模式名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of table names defined in the database.
trans-unit.target: 返回数据库中定义的表名数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the associated objects' ids
trans-unit.target: 返回相关对象的ID数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the associated objects' ids.
trans-unit.target: 返回关联对象ID的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the names of any attributes that will change when the record is next saved.
trans-unit.target: 返回下一次保存记录时将改变的任何属性的名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the values at the specified indices, but also raises an exception when one of the keys can't be found.
trans-unit.target: 返回指定索引处的值的数组,但当其中一个键找不到时也会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the values at the specified indices:
trans-unit.target: 返回指定索引处的数值数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of the values of the first column in a select:
trans-unit.target: 返回选择中第一列的值的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array of view names defined in the database.
trans-unit.target: 返回数据库中定义的视图名称数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with all classes that are < than its receiver.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个数组，其中所有类均小于其接收者。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with distinct records based on the group attribute:
trans-unit.target: 根据 group 属性返回具有不同记录的数组：

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the direct children of self.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有 self 的直接子元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an array with the name of the attributes with unsaved changes.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个包含未保存的属性名称的数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an escaped version of html without affecting existing escaped entities.
trans-unit.target: 返回 html 的转义版本，而不影响现有的转义实体。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input of type “search” for accessing a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object_name). Inputs of type “search” may be styled differently by some browsers.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型为“ search”的输入，以访问分配给模板（由 object_name 标识）的对象上的指定属性（由 method 标识）。某些浏览器可能会为“搜索”类型的输入设置不同的样式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the "date" type tailored for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定属性而定制的 "日期 "类型的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the "email" type tailored for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定属性而定制的 "email "类型的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the "password" type tailored for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个为访问指定属性而定制的 "密码 "类型的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the "text" type tailored for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回为访问指定属性而定制的 "文本 "类型的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the "url" type tailored for accessing a specified attribute.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 "url "类型的输入标签,用于访问指定的属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the “password” type tailored for accessing a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). Additional options on the input tag can be passed as a hash with options. These options will be tagged onto the HTML as an HTML element attribute as in the example shown. For security reasons this field is blank by default; pass in a value via options if this is not desired.
trans-unit.target: 返回“密码”类型的输入标签，该标签专门用于访问分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上的指定属性（由 method 标识）。输入标签上的其他选项可以作为带有 options 的哈希值传递。这些选项将被标记为HTML元素属性，如所示示例中所示。出于安全原因，此字段默认为空白；如果不需要，可以通过 options 传递一个值。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of the “text” type tailored for accessing a specified attribute (identified by method) on an object assigned to the template (identified by object). Additional options on the input tag can be passed as a hash with options. These options will be tagged onto the HTML as an HTML element attribute as in the example shown.
trans-unit.target: 返回“文本”类型的输入标签，该标签专门用于访问分配给模板（由 object 标识）的对象上的指定属性（由 method 标识）。输入标签上的其他选项可以作为带有 options 的哈希值传递。这些选项将被标记为HTML元素属性，如所示示例中所示。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of type “number”.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型为“数字”的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an input tag of type “range”.
trans-unit.target: 返回类型为“范围”的输入标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of DateTime with the timezone's UTC offset
trans-unit.target: 返回带有时区UTC偏移量的DateTime实例

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of Time, either with the same UTC offset as self or in the local system timezone depending on the setting of ActiveSupport.to_time_preserves_timezone.
trans-unit.target: 返回的实例 Time ，用相同的UTC胶印 self 或依据的设置本地系统时区 ActiveSupport.to_time_preserves_timezone 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the class ActiveModel::Errors containing all errors. Each key is the attribute name and the value is an array of strings with all errors.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含所有错误的 ActiveModel::Errors 类的实例。每个键都是属性名称，值是带有所有错误的字符串数组。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the job class queued with arguments available in Job#arguments.
trans-unit.target: 返回Job#arguments中包含参数的排队作业类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the queue adapter and defaults to ActiveJob::QueueAdapters::TestAdapter.
trans-unit.target: 返回队列适配器的实例，默认为 ActiveJob::QueueAdapters::TestAdapter 。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance of the specified klass with the attributes of the current record. This is mostly useful in relation to single-table inheritance structures where you want a subclass to appear as the superclass. This can be used along with record identification in Action Pack to allow, say, Client < Company to do something like render partial: @client.becomes(Company) to render that instance using the companies/company partial instead of clients/client.
trans-unit.target: 返回具有当前记录属性的指定 klass 的实例。对于希望子类作为超类出现的单表继承结构，这最有用。可以将它与Action Pack中的记录标识一起使用，例如，允许 Client < Company 进行渲染 partial: @client.becomes(Company) 使用company / company部分而不是client / client来渲染该实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an instance, whose complete! method must be invoked after the work has been performed.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个实例，它的 complete! 工作完成后必须调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an open Tempfile containing a transformed image in the given format. All subclasses implement this method.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个打开的临时文件，其中包含给定 format 的转换图像。所有子类都实现此方法。

trans-unit.source: Returns an unsafe, unfiltered ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess representation of the parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回参数的不安全，未经过滤的 ActiveSupport::HashWithIndifferentAccess 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns an xml formatted representation of the Errors hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回错误哈希的xml格式表示。

trans-unit.source: Returns any connections in use by the current thread back to the pool, and also returns connections to the pool cached by threads that are no longer alive.
trans-unit.target: 将当前线程正在使用的任何连接返回到池中,同时也返回由不再存活的线程缓存到池中的连接。

trans-unit.source: Returns both GET and POST parameters in a single hash.
trans-unit.target: 在单个哈希中返回GET和POST参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns check box tags for the collection of existing return values of method for object's class. The value returned from calling method on the instance object will be selected. If calling method returns nil, no selection is made.
trans-unit.target: 返回复选框标签为现有的返回值的收集 method 为 object 的类。从实例 object 调用 method 返回的值将被选中。如果调用 method 返回 nil ，则不进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Returns columns which shouldn't be exposed while calling #inspect.
trans-unit.target: 返回在调用 #inspect 时不应公开的列。

trans-unit.source: Returns constant of subscription adapter specified in config/cable.yml. If the adapter cannot be found, this will default to the Redis adapter. Also makes sure proper dependencies are required.
trans-unit.target: 返回config/cable.yml中指定的订阅适配器的常量。如果找不到适配器,将默认为Redis适配器。同时确保需要适当的依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Returns current ActionController::Parameters instance which contains only the given keys.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，该实例仅包含给定的 keys 。

trans-unit.source: Returns current ActionController::Parameters instance with other_hash merged into current hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前的 ActionController::Parameters 实例，其中 other_hash 合并到当前哈希中。

trans-unit.source: Returns current ActionController::Parameters instance with current hash merged into other_hash.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 ActionController::Parameters 实例，其中当前哈希值已合并到 other_hash 中。

trans-unit.source: Returns default aliases for the option name given doing a lookup in Rails::Generators.aliases.
trans-unit.target: 返回在 Rails::Generators.aliases 中进行查找时给出的选项名称的默认别名。

trans-unit.source: Returns default for the option name given doing a lookup in config.
trans-unit.target: 在config中查找选项名称时返回默认值。

trans-unit.source: Returns duplicate of object including all parameters.
trans-unit.target: 返回包括所有参数的对象的副本。

trans-unit.source: Returns false if no_wait is set and the lock is not immediately available. Otherwise, returns true after the lock has been acquired.
trans-unit.target: 如果设置了 no_wait 且锁不立即可用，则返回false 。否则，在获取锁定后返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns false on a valid response, true otherwise
trans-unit.target: 有效响应时返回false,否则返回true。

trans-unit.source: Returns false unless the request credentials response value matches the expected value. First try the password as a ha1 digest password. If this fails, then try it as a plain text password.
trans-unit.target: 除非请求凭证响应值与预期值一致,否则返回false。首先以ha1摘要密码的形式尝试密码,如果失败,则以纯文本密码的形式尝试。如果失败,则尝试使用纯文本密码。

trans-unit.source: Returns filtered value for given key. For Proc filters, third block argument is not populated.
trans-unit.target: 返回给定键的过滤值。对于 Proc 过滤器，不会填充第三个block参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns fully resolved ActiveRecord::DatabaseConfigurations object
trans-unit.target: 返回完全解析的ActiveRecord :: DatabaseConfigurations对象

trans-unit.source: Returns just a table's primary key
trans-unit.target: 只返回一个表的主键

trans-unit.source: Returns maximum number of joins in a single query.
trans-unit.target: 返回单个查询中的最大连接数。

trans-unit.source: Returns messages transmitted into channel
trans-unit.target: 返回传入通道的信息

trans-unit.source: Returns meta tags "csrf-param" and "csrf-token" with the name of the cross-site request forgery protection parameter and token, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回元标签 "csrf-param "和 "csrf-token",分别包含跨站请求防伪参数和令牌的名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns meta tags “csrf-param” and “csrf-token” with the name of the cross-site request forgery protection parameter and token, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 返回带有跨站点请求伪造保护参数和令牌名称的元标记“ csrf-param”和“ csrf-token”。

trans-unit.source: Returns nothing.
trans-unit.target: 不返回任何东西。

trans-unit.source: Returns one or more new objects of the collection type that have been instantiated with attributes and linked to this object through a foreign key, but have not yet been saved.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个或多个集合类型的新对象，这些对象已使用 attributes 实例化并通过外键链接到该对象，但尚未保存。

trans-unit.source: Returns optimized string with indentation
trans-unit.target: 返回带缩进的优化字符串

trans-unit.source: Returns radio button tags for the collection of existing return values of method for object's class. The value returned from calling method on the instance object will be selected. If calling method returns nil, no selection is made.
trans-unit.target: 返回对现有的返回值的集合单选按钮标记 method 为 object 的类。从实例 object 调用 method 返回的值将被选中。如果调用 method 返回 nil ，则不进行选择。

trans-unit.source: Returns secrets added to config/secrets.yml.
trans-unit.target: 返回添加到config/secrets.yml中的秘密。

trans-unit.source: Returns select and option tags for the given object and method, using time_zone_options_for_select to generate the list of option tags.
trans-unit.target: 使用time_zone_options_for_select生成选项标签列表，返回给定对象和方法的选择标签和选项标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns select and option tags for the given object and method, using time_zone_options_for_select to generate the list of option tags.
trans-unit.target: 使用 time_zone_options_for_select 生成选项标签列表，返回给定对象和方法的选择标签和选项标签。

trans-unit.source: Returns singleton instance for this class in this thread. If none exists, one is created.
trans-unit.target: 返回本线程中该类的单人实例。如果不存在,则创建一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns size of the records.
trans-unit.target: 返回记录的大小。

trans-unit.source: Returns sql statement for the relation.
trans-unit.target: 返回关系的sql语句。

trans-unit.source: Returns string denoting the name of the configured queue adapter. By default returns +“async”+.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示已配置队列适配器名称的字符串。默认情况下返回+“异步” +。

trans-unit.source: Returns string to use for params names. It differs for namespaced models regarding whether it's inside isolated engine.
trans-unit.target: 返回用于参数名称的字符串。对于命名空间的模型,它与是否在隔离的引擎内不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns string to use while generating route names. It differs for namespaced models regarding whether it's inside isolated engine.
trans-unit.target: 返回生成路径名时要使用的字符串。对于命名间隔的模型,根据是否在隔离的引擎内而有所不同。

trans-unit.source: Returns the DatabaseConfigurations object as a Hash.
trans-unit.target: 以Hash的形式返回DatabaseConfigurations对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Errors object that holds all information about attribute error messages.
trans-unit.target: 返回包含有关属性错误消息的所有信息的 Errors 对象。

trans-unit.source: Returns the String full path including params of the last URL requested.
trans-unit.target: 返回 String 完整路径，包括最后请求的URL的参数。

trans-unit.source: Returns the i18n_scope for the class. Overwrite if you want custom lookup.
trans-unit.target: 返回该类的 i18n_scope 。如果要自定义查找，请覆盖。

trans-unit.source: Returns the signed or encrypted jar, preferring encrypted if secret_key_base is set. Used by ActionDispatch::Session::CookieStore to avoid the need to introduce new cookie stores.
trans-unit.target: 返回已 signed 或 encrypted jar，如果设置了 secret_key_base ，则首选 encrypted 。由ActionDispatch :: Session :: CookieStore使用，以避免引入新的Cookie存储区。

trans-unit.source: Returns the AggregateReflection object for the named aggregation (use the symbol).
trans-unit.target: 返回命名 aggregation 的AggregateReflection对象（使用符号）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the AssociationReflection object for the association (use the symbol).
trans-unit.target: 返回的AssociationReflection对象 association （用符号）。

trans-unit.source: Returns the CPU time (in milliseconds) passed since the call to start! and the call to finish!
trans-unit.target: 返回自调用 start! 以来经过的CPU时间（以毫秒为单位）！并 finish! 通话！

trans-unit.source: Returns the HTTP method that the application should see. In the case where the method was overridden by a middleware (for instance, if a HEAD request was converted to a #GET, or if a _method parameter was used to determine the method the application should use), this method returns the overridden value, not the original.
trans-unit.target: 返回应用程序应看到的HTTP方法。如果该方法被中间件覆盖（例如，如果将HEAD请求转换为#GET，或者使用_method参数确定应用程序应使用的方法），则此方法返回覆盖的值，不是原始的。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address of client as a String, usually set by the RemoteIp middleware.
trans-unit.target: 以 String 的形式返回客户端的IP地址，通常由RemoteIp中间件设置。

trans-unit.source: Returns the IP address of client as a String.
trans-unit.target: 以 String 的形式返回客户端的IP地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns the KC normalization of the string by default. NFKC is considered the best normalization form for passing strings to databases and validations.
trans-unit.target: 默认返回字符串的KC归一化。NFKC被认为是向数据库和验证传递字符串的最佳归一化形式。

trans-unit.source: Returns the MIME type for the format used in the request.
trans-unit.target: 返回请求中使用的格式的MIME类型。

trans-unit.source: Returns the TimeZone for the current request, if this has been set (via ::zone=). If Time.zone has not been set for the current request, returns the TimeZone specified in config.time_zone.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前请求的TimeZone（如果已设置）（通过:: zone =）。如果尚未为当前请求设置 Time.zone ，则返回 config.time_zone 中指定的TimeZone 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URL for the set of options provided. This takes the same options as url_for in Action Controller (see the documentation for ActionController::Base#url_for). Note that by default :only_path is true so you'll get the relative “/controller/action” instead of the fully qualified URL like “example.com/controller/action”.
trans-unit.target: 返回提供的 options 集的URL 。这与Action Controller中的 url_for 具有相同的选项（请参阅 ActionController::Base#url_for 的文档）。请注意，默认情况下 :only_path 为 true ,因此您将获得相对的“ / controller / action”，而不是诸如“ example.com/controller/action ”之类的完全限定的URL 。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URL of the blob on the service. This URL is intended to be short-lived for security and not used directly with users. Instead, the service_url should only be exposed as a redirect from a stable, possibly authenticated URL. Hiding the service_url behind a redirect also gives you the power to change services without updating all URLs. And it allows permanent URLs that redirect to the service_url to be cached in the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务上Blob的URL。该URL旨在缩短安全性，不能直接与用户一起使用。相反， service_url 仅应作为来自稳定的，可能已通过身份验证的URL的重定向公开。将 service_url 隐藏在重定向后面还使您能够更改服务而无需更新所有URL。并且它允许将重定向到 service_url 的永久URL 缓存在视图中。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URL of the preview's variant on the service. Raises ActiveStorage::Preview::UnprocessedError if the preview has not been processed yet.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务上预览的变体的URL。如果预览还没有被处理,将引发ActiveStorage::Preview::UnprocessedError。

trans-unit.source: Returns the URL of the variant on the service. This URL is intended to be short-lived for security and not used directly with users. Instead, the service_url should only be exposed as a redirect from a stable, possibly authenticated URL. Hiding the service_url behind a redirect also gives you the power to change services without updating all URLs. And it allows permanent URLs that redirect to the service_url to be cached in the view.
trans-unit.target: 返回服务上变体的URL。该URL旨在缩短安全性，不能直接与用户一起使用。相反， service_url 仅应作为来自稳定的，可能已通过身份验证的URL的重定向公开。将 service_url 隐藏在重定向后面还使您能够更改服务而无需更新所有URL。并且它允许将重定向到 service_url 的永久URL 缓存在视图中。

trans-unit.source: Rotation is ideal for changing cookie configurations and ensuring old cookies aren't immediately invalid. Your users then have a chance to visit your site, get their cookie read with an old configuration and have it rewritten with the new change. The rotation can then be removed once you're comfortable enough users have had their chance to get their cookies upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 轮换是改变cookie配置和确保旧cookie不会立即失效的理想选择。然后,您的用户有机会访问您的网站,用旧的配置读取他们的cookie,然后用新的变化重写它。一旦您对用户有足够的机会让他们的cookie升级感到满意,就可以删除轮换。

trans-unit.source: Ruby 1.8.7 p248 and p249 have marshalling bugs that crash Rails. Ruby Enterprise Edition has these fixed since the release of 1.8.7-2010.02. On the 1.9 front, Ruby 1.9.1 is not usable because it outright segfaults, so if you want to use 1.9.x, jump straight to 1.9.3 for smooth sailing.

trans-unit.source: Ruby looks for the file in the directories listed in $LOAD_PATH. That is, Ruby iterates over all its directories and for each one of them checks whether they have a file called "erb.rb", or "erb.so", or "erb.o", or "erb.dll". If it finds any of them, the interpreter loads it and ends the search. Otherwise, it tries again in the next directory of the list. If the list gets exhausted, LoadError is raised.
trans-unit.target: Ruby在 $LOAD_PATH 列出的目录中查找文件。也就是说，Ruby遍历其所有目录，并针对每个目录检查它们是否具有名为“ erb.rb”，“ erb.so”，“ erb.o”或“ erb.dll”的文件。如果找到它们中的任何一个，则解释器将其加载并结束搜索。否则，它将在列表的下一个目录中再次尝试。如果列表用尽， LoadError 引发LoadError。

trans-unit.source: Ruby on Rails has a built-in filter for special SQL characters, which will escape ' , " , NULL character, and line breaks. Using Model.find(id) or Model.find_by_some thing(something) automatically applies this countermeasure. But in SQL fragments, especially in conditions fragments (where("...")), the connection.execute() or Model.find_by_sql() methods, it has to be applied manually.
trans-unit.target: Ruby on Rails具有用于特殊SQL字符的内置过滤器，这些过滤器将转义'，“，NULL字符和换行符。使用 Model.find(id) 或 Model.find_by_some thing(something) 自动应用此对策。 SQL片段，尤其是条件片段（ where("...") ）， connection.execute() 或 Model.find_by_sql() 方法中的 SQL片段，必须手动应用。

trans-unit.source: Ruby performs a lookup for the constant that follows a class or module keyword because it needs to know if the class or module is going to be created or reopened.
trans-unit.target: Ruby对在 class 或 module 关键字后面的常量执行查找，因为它需要知道是要创建还是重新打开该类或模块。

trans-unit.source: SQL injection attacks aim at influencing database queries by manipulating web application parameters. A popular goal of SQL injection attacks is to bypass authorization. Another goal is to carry out data manipulation or reading arbitrary data. Here is an example of how not to use user input data in a query:
trans-unit.target: SQL注入攻击的目的是通过操纵Web应用程序参数来影响数据库查询。SQL注入攻击的一个流行目标是绕过授权。另一个目标是进行数据操作或读取任意数据。下面是一个例子,说明如何不在查询中使用用户输入数据。

trans-unit.source: Scoping allows you to specify commonly-used queries which can be referenced as method calls on the association objects or models. With these scopes, you can use every method previously covered such as where, joins and includes. All scope bodies should return an ActiveRecord::Relation or nil to allow for further methods (such as other scopes) to be called on it.
trans-unit.target: 范围界定允许您指定常用查询，这些查询可以作为对关联对象或模型的方法调用进行引用。通过这些作用域，您可以使用以前涵盖的每种方法，例如 where ， joins 和 includes 。所有作用域主体都应返回 ActiveRecord::Relation 或 nil ,以允许在其上调用其他方法（例如其他作用域）。

trans-unit.source: Search engines seem to like that content in different languages lives at different, inter-linked domains.
trans-unit.target: 搜索引擎似乎喜欢不同语言的内容生活在不同的、相互链接的域中。

trans-unit.target: 二级和高阶的联想也可以。

trans-unit.source: Second, if the key starts with a period translate will scope the key by the current partial. Calling translate(".foo") from the people/index.html.erb template is equivalent to calling translate("people.index.foo"). This makes it less repetitive to translate many keys within the same partial and provides a convention to scope keys consistently.
trans-unit.target: 其次，如果键以句点开头，则 translate 将按当前部分范围对键进行范围划分。从 people/index.html.erb 模板调用 translate(".foo") 等效于调用 translate("people.index.foo") 。这使得在同一部分内转换许多键的重复性降低，并为一致范围的键提供了约定。

trans-unit.source: Second, if we DON'T find a template but the controller action does have templates for other formats, variants, etc., then we trust that you meant to provide a template for this response, too, and we raise ActionController::UnknownFormat with an explanation.
trans-unit.target: 其次，如果我们没有找到一个模板，但控制器动作确实有其他格式模板，变体等，那么我们相信，你的意思是，这种响应提供了一个模板，也和我们提出 ActionController::UnknownFormat 与一个解释。

trans-unit.source: Second, we rely on the fact that the WebSocket connection is established with the cookies from the domain being sent along. This makes it easy to use signed cookies that were set when logging in via a web interface to authorize the WebSocket connection.
trans-unit.target: 其次,我们依靠 WebSocket 连接与来自域的 Cookie 一起建立。这使得我们可以很容易地使用通过网络接口登录时设置的签名cookies来授权WebSocket连接。

trans-unit.source: Securing Rails Applications
trans-unit.target: 确保Rails应用的安全

trans-unit.source: Security
trans-unit.target: Security

trans-unit.source: Security Issues
trans-unit.target: 安全问题

trans-unit.source: Security, especially in web applications, is a broad and detailed area. Security in your Rails application is covered in more depth in the Ruby on Rails Security Guide.
trans-unit.target: 安全性，尤其是Web应用程序中的安全性，是一个广泛而详尽的领域。《Ruby on Rails安全性指南》中更深入地介绍了Rails应用程序中的安全性。

trans-unit.source: Security: Rails detects and thwarts IP spoofing attacks and handles cryptographic signatures in a timing attack aware way. Don't know what an IP spoofing attack or a timing attack is? Exactly.
trans-unit.target: 安全性：Rails可检测并阻止IP欺骗攻击，并以定时攻击感知的方式处理密码签名。不知道什么是IP欺骗攻击或定时攻击？究竟。
